title: Parrot

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Assist a Crew member during the day.
-Mimick a target during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Assisted Crew members may perform their night ability twice the following night.
-You will use the first ability of your mimicked target on a target the following night.

desc:
Post 1704
*Do what you want cuz a pirate is free, you are a pirate!*
